bind rows for dataframes with units

bind_rows.Rd

bind rows for dataframes with units

bind_rows(..., .id = NULL)

Arguments

...

dataframes to bind together

Examples

library(dplyr)
#> 
#> Attaching package: ‘dplyr’
#> The following object is masked from ‘package:PMDatR’:
#> 
#>     bind_rows
#> The following object is masked from ‘package:testthat’:
#> 
#>     matches
#> The following objects are masked from ‘package:stats’:
#> 
#>     filter, lag
#> The following objects are masked from ‘package:base’:
#> 
#>     intersect, setdiff, setequal, union
library(PMDatR)
th1 <- set_units_from_list(Theoph, list(Wt = "kg")) %>%
    mutate(WTunit="kg")
th2 <- set_units_from_list(Theoph, list(Wt = "lb")) %>%
    mutate(WTunit = "lb")

#the WTFLG groups are both scaled to kg
bind_rows(th1, th2) %>%
    distinct(Subject, WTunit, .keep_all = TRUE)
#> Warning: Vectorizing 'pmunits' elements may not preserve their attributes
#> Warning: Vectorizing 'pmunits' elements may not preserve their attributes
